technology.name: Sharper Stabbas
technology.description: "Dem gobbos are already good at sneakin', just gotta make 'em betta at stabbin'."

effects.description: Scrap Upgrades Unlocked for: Goblins, Goblin Archers, Pump Wagons and Nasty Skulkers
Weapon strength: +10% for Pump Wagon units
Melee attack: +2 for Goblin and Night Goblin infantry units

technology.name: Spider Worship
technology.description: "Gotta hand it to those Forest Goblins, easy to get dead wranglin' massive spiders. Better dem than us!"

effects.description: Scrap Upgrades Unlocked for: Goblin Spider Riders and Goblin Spider Rider Archers
Recruitment cost: -10% for Spider Rider units
Melee attack: +3 for Spider Rider units

technology.name: Pointier Rockz
technology.description: "Da ladz ain't got da best aim, but at least we can make 'em hurt fings more!"

effects.description: Scrap Upgrades Unlocked for: Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult
Ammunition: +10% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units
Missile strength: +10% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units

technology.name: Bigga Loot Cart
technology.description: "So many shiny fings! We need a bigga cart so we make sure we gets it all!"

technology.name: 'Normus Loot Cart
technology.description: "We's gonna need a bigga loot cart…"

effects.description: Attribute: Charge Defence vs. Large for Boyz, Big 'Uns and Black Orcs units
Recruit rank: +1 for Boyz, Big 'Uns and Black Orcs units
Ability: "Squigs go Boom! for Goblin Big Bosses"

ui_effects.description: Spawn a unit of Explosive Squig
Almost no damage against single entity units

effects.description: Attribute: Immune to Psychology for all Goblins, Squigs, Artillery and Spiders units
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
Vigour loss reduction: -25% for Savage Orcs, Trolls, Rogue Idols, Wyverns and Giants units

technology.name: Go Fasta!
technology.description: "Someone tell those gits to move those legs fasta or we'll send da Squigs after 'em!"

technology.name: No Infightin'!
technology.description: "If we tell da ladz to kill each other less, dey can kill da enemy more!"

effects.description: Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition

technology.name: Healy Mushrooms
technology.description: "Dey taste like death, but do da opposite!"

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -40% for all Goblins, Squigs, Artillery and Spiders units
Melee attack: +6 for Savage Orcs, Trolls, Rogue Idols, Wyverns and Giants units

technology.name: Wolf Breedin'
technology.description: "Get dem wolf pups when dey's young, makes 'em easier to train without gettin' ya bits bitten off!"

effects.description: Scrap Upgrades Unlocked for: Goblin Wolf Chariot, Goblin Wolf Riders and Goblin Wolf Rider Archers
Recruit rank: +1 for Boar, Wolf and Spider Rider units
Vigour loss reduction: -10% for Wolf Rider units

technology.name: Betta Arrer 'Eads
technology.description: "We stole da designs from da stinkin' Elves!"

effects.description: Scrap Upgrades Unlocked for: Night Goblins, Night Goblin Archers, Night Goblins (Fanatics) and Night Goblin Archers (Fanatics)
Missile strength: +8% for missile infantry units

technology.name: Raknik Spiderclaw
technology.description: "Shamans are nasty buggers as it iz, but Raknik iz one depraved gobbo!"

effects.description: Adds the Goblin Great Shaman Raknik Spiderclaw to your faction's Lord pool

technology.name: Sneakin'
technology.description: "If da gits can't run fasta, make 'em hide betta!"

technology.name: Trollin'
technology.description: "Ya can't teach a fish to climb a tree, but ya can teach a Troll to hit fings harder!"

effects.description: Scrap Upgrades Unlocked for: Trolls, River Trolls and Stone Trolls

technology.name: Gork n' Mork
technology.description: "Love 'em equally, or else…"

effects.description: Melee defence: +6 for Boyz, Big 'Uns and Black Orcs units
Spell resistance: 20% for all Goblins, Squigs, Artillery and Spiders units
Charge bonus: +40% for Savage Orcs, Trolls, Rogue Idols, Wyverns and Giants units

technology.name: Use 'Em
technology.description: "Those stoopid gobbos are throwin' stuff at us boss, and dey’s enjoyin’ it too. Put ‘em to betta use!"

effects.description: Recruit rank: +1 for Goblin and Night Goblin units
Missile strength: +8% for Goblin and Night Goblin missile infantry units

technology.name: No Complainin'
technology.description: "Shuddup, da lot of ya! Or da Boss'll have ya!"

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10% for Boyz, Big 'Uns and Black Orcs units
Armour-Piercing Melee Damage: +4 for all Goblins, Squigs, Artillery and Spiders units
Reload time reduction: +10% for all Goblins, Squigs, Artillery and Spiders units
Upkeep: -10% for Savage Orcs, Trolls, Rogue Idols, Wyverns and Giants units
Speed: +10% for Savage Orcs, Trolls, Rogue Idols, Wyverns and Giants units

technology.name: Waaagh!!!
technology.description: "'Ere come da boyz! Dey want Waaagh!"

technology.name: Gobby Gobbos
technology.description: "Da gobbos been gettin' a bit angsty. Maybe we should give 'em some toys to play with."

effects.description: Missile strength: +10% for Goblin and Night Goblin missile infantry units

technology.name: Gobbo Crack Down
technology.description: "Give da orcy boyz a bit more smashin’ practice, let ‘em bring da gobbos back in line."

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Orc infantry units

technology.name: Egg ‘Em On!
technology.description: "Maybe those gobbos iz deservin' of some respect and en-cur-rage-ment?"

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for Goblin units
Physical resistance: 5% for Goblin and Night Goblin infantry units

technology.name: On Second Thoughts...
technology.description: "I dunno what we was thinkin', Boss... da gobbos is definitely expendable, dey make da best fodder!"

effects.description: Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for all Goblins
Ammunition: +25% for Doom Diver Catapult units

technology.name: Beyond Countin'
technology.description: "Gettin' a bit crowded 'round 'ere lately. Put da gits to good use!"

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -10% for Big 'Uns and Black Orc units
Global recruitment duration: -1 turn for all units

technology.name: Sharin' is Carin'
technology.description: "We's gonna share more of da loot, Boss. Share more with you I mean!"

effects.description:
Upkeep: -8%
	(own armies factionwide in enemy territory)

technology.name: Stronga Howdahs
technology.description: "A bit of protect-shun for da ridey-ladz means more of 'em survivin' to squash fings."

effects.description: Scrap Upgrades Unlocked for: Arachnarok Spider

technology.name: Scrap Compactor
technology.description: "Da more scrap we can carry, da more stuff we’s gonna make for da killin’!"

technology.name: Da Biggest Waaagh!!!
technology.description: "Have ya eva seen such a pretty site? There aint nuthin' greena or meana than a full-blown Waaagh!"

effects.description: Control: +2 in own provinces where an army is present

technology.name: Abuse 'Em!
technology.description: "A lazy gobbo's a useless gobbo. Let's give 'em somefink to get angry about!"

effects.description: Speed: +5% for Goblin and Night Goblin units
Charge bonus: +10% for Night Goblin units

technology.name: Pullin' Teef
technology.description: "Make sure everyone's payin' dues, Boss. Send da boys out for a spot of teef collectin'."

technology.name: Boar Ridin'
technology.description: "Dey be stinkin', stoopid, n' flea-ridden, but dem boars be pretty good in a fight!"

effects.description: Scrap Upgrades Unlocked for: Orc Boar Boyz, Orc Boar Boy Big 'Uns and Orc Boar Chariot
Charge bonus: +10% for Orc Boar units
Armour: +5 for Orc Boar Riders and Orc Boar Big 'Uns units

technology.name: Boar Paintin'
technology.description: "Everyone knows dat a bit of red paint on anyfink makes everyfink go fasta!"

effects.description: Scrap Upgrades Unlocked for: Savage Orc Boar Boyz and Savage Orc Boar Boy Big 'Uns
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +8 for Savage Orc cavalry units
Recruitment cost: -10% for Savage Orc units

technology.name: Oglok the 'Orrible
technology.description: "I know a guy… he's pretty 'orrible."

effects.description: Adds the Orc Warboss Oglok the 'Orrible to your faction's Lord pool

technology.name: Shiny Magic Fings
technology.description: "Sometimes I fink dem Shamans are just wingin' it, but if dey's helpin' I ain't complainin'!"

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

technology.name: Stone Armour
technology.description: "Corr its 'evy! Too 'evy! Save it for da big 'uns!"

effects.description: Scrap Upgrades Unlocked for: Giant and Rogue Idol
Physical resistance: 10% for Rogue Idol units

technology.name: Stranger Danger
technology.description: "Da new rule of murderin' anyone we don't recognise iz workin' well, I fink."

effects.description: Siege towers: +1 per siege item constructed

technology.name: Go Bigga!
technology.description: "Bigga camps means a bigga tribe, and more ladz for fightin’!"

technology.name: Big 'Un Bullies
technology.description: "If we send some of da big 'uns, I'm sure dey can 'convince' some of da other tribes' ladz to join us…"

technology.name: Less Eatin', More Buildin'
technology.description: "Let’s see how dem useless gobbos work when we withhold some of their rations."

technology.name: 'Eavy Metal
technology.description: "The betta the metal, the betta the murderin'!"

effects.description: Scrap Upgrades Unlocked for: Orc Boyz, Orc Arrer Boyz, Boneklubber Tribe Savage Orcs and Orc Big 'Uns
Weapon strength: +5% for Orc infantry units

technology.name: 'Eavy Clubs
technology.description: "Who doesn't like a bigga club? Means bigga heads gettin' bashed."

effects.description: Scrap Upgrades Unlocked for: Savage Orcs, Savage Orc Arrer Boyz, Boneklubber Tribe Savage Orcs and Savage Orc Big 'Uns
Casualty replenishment rate: +5% for Savage Orc units
Melee attack: +2 for Orc infantry units
Melee attack: +4 for Savage Orc units

technology.name: Toothy Weapons
technology.description: "All ya gots to do iz sharpen dem Squiq teeth and strap a few on an axe. Might lose a finger or two doin' it, tho."

effects.description: Scrap Upgrades Unlocked for: Black Orcs, Squig Herd, Colossal Squig and Night Goblin Squig Hoppers
Melee attack: +2 for Orc infantry units
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +10 for Black Orc units

technology.name: Bigga n' Betta Bosses
technology.description: "Of course dey's not as good as you boss, but dey's still pretty good."

effects.description: [HIDDEN - do not translate] Used to increase lord rank when replacing a lord (target the effect at forces factionwide) - use in conjunction with a shown effect that targets provinces factionwide

technology.name: Ladz, Ladz, Ladz
technology.description: "Each of these 'ere boys iz one of da ladz now, Boss. Makin' us proud!"

effects.description: Upkeep: -4% for Orc Boyz, Savage Orcs, Orc Boar Boyz and Savage Orc Boar Boyz units

technology.name: Bash for Gork. Stab for Mork
